name: Cursed Be
description:
Winnie Mercado, a high school freshman struggling to fit in, has been living with a curse of unknown origin for some time now: flowers grow from her skin and create magic. While she's just barely managing to keep it hidden in her daily life, she one day stumbles across a cult that wants to use her curse to commune with their god. Determined to not be captured, Winnie and her best friend Mars begin the arduous journey to run away.

This game contains descriptions of eye-related trauma.
